content: make a charming crochet beret for when you re feeling a little fruity using red heart super saver both strawberry and pear versions are stitched in double_crochet from the crown in a continuous spiral working simple increases to shape the top decreases using double_crochet 2 together form the brim while the stem and leaves are crocheted separately and sewn to the top for an authentic touch the strawberry version is finished with embroidered seeds in a simple straight stitch it s a delightful way to add color and whimsy to your look materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m strawberry version contrast a shocking pink 0718 1 ball or 124 yds/113 m contrast b spring green 0672 1 ball or 29 yds/26 m contrast c soft white 0316 1 ball or 11 yds/10 m pear version contrast a spring green 0672 1 ball or 124 yds/113 m measurement one size to fit adult approx 20 51 cm circumference contrast b medium thyme 0406 1 ball or 29 yds/26 m
